title: What are the most motivational song lyrics? - Quora

A hardcore music lover here! Songs with lyrics which I can connect to, hits me different . I love imagining myself at the place of the singer and just loose myself in the deep ocean of the words, the words that make me forget all the anger , all the sadness ,all the fights, all the defeats and what not!! One of such songs which I absolutely absolutely love an highly recommend is ON MY WAY by ALAN WALKER. The lyrics are so good that every line heals you from within, gives you the power to live life the way you want and that's what I like in it!! i'm sorry butDon't wanna talk, I need a moment before I goIt's nothing personalI draw the blindsThey don't need to see me cry❤️'Cause even if they understand❤️They don't understand❤️ So then when I'm finishedI'm all 'bout my business and ready to save the worldI'm taking my miseryMake it my bitch; can't be everyone's favorite girl❤️ So take aim and fire away❤️I've never been so wide awake❤️No, nobody but me can keep me safe❤️And I'm on my way❤️The blood moon is on the riseThe fire burning in my eyesNo, nobody but me can keep me safeAnd I'm on my way. . . . . . . . I'm on my way!!!!!!!❤️❤️❤️ Signing off Ritika 💙
